QuestData.Title: Orders, Commander?
QuestData.Description: Commander $n, it's an honor.$B$BWe're barely holding on, $Gsir:madame;. We have a week's supplies at best, assuming we have any troops left to supply in that time.$B$BWe have just enough material left to put up an inn or a trading post.$B$BThe inn would allow us to station reinforcements here, while the trading post would allow supply routes with the outcasts nearby.$B$BWe need your authorization for the project, commander. It's your decision.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspect the Drafting Table and choose which outpost structure to construct.
QuestData.RewardText: Praise the Light you're here. I thought we were going to have to wait until a courier could reach you for a decision on this.
